9399e1a1-0ad2-4a74-a5ef-8f76995fdb07 China's demonstration HTR-PM enters commercial operationThe world’s first modular high temperature gas-cooled reactor nuclear power plant has entered commercial operation, China’s National Energy Administration has announced. 891171f5-e0e3-4cf6-96e4-f61a1c9a7a3d TRIGA International to produce fuel for US microreactorTRIGA International - a joint venture between Framatome and General Atomics - has been awarded a contract to fabricate TRIGA-like fuel for the US Department of Energy's Microreactor Applications Research Validation and Evaluation microreactor. 1caf728b-aa8a-4f9d-b7ef-1e1c2e20ee08 Second APR-1400 at Shin Hanul starts upUnit 2 of the Shin Hanul nuclear power plant in South Korea has attained a sustained chain reaction for the first time, Korea Hydro & Nuclear Power announced. The unit is the second of two APR-1400 reactors at the site, with a further two planned. Wed, 06 Dec 2023 12:28:56 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/Second-APR-1400-at-Shin-Hanul-starts-up?feed=feed

30599b50-10d8-411d-912a-61f075804c33 Moon base micro-reactor concept unveiled by Rolls-RoyceThe results of a UK Space Agency backed research programme have been unveiled by Rolls-Royce, with the company saying it aims to have a micro-reactor ready to send to the Moon by the early 2030s. e2eff95d-49ee-47ea-b350-d53a5306fefc KHNP touts i-SMR to international audienceKorea Hydro & Nuclear Power has used the <em>第 28 届联合国气候变化大会 (COP28) 在阿联酋迪拜举行，推出全新创新 SMR 技术及其 i-SMR 驱动的智能零网城市模型。该公司已同意与印度尼西亚和约旦合作伙伴合作调查 i-SMR 装置的部署。; Mon, 04 Dec 2023 15:23:41 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/KHNP-touts-i-SMR-to-international-audience?feed=feed
